description:
This mod adds a selection of new variants sporting equipment from "Yet Another Equipment Collection.

Most of the mechs are lore-accurate, some, however, are shamelessly ripped off of Roguetech, the greatest game ever!

Included Normalish Variants

- Annihilatior ANH-2AX
- Annihilatior ANH-3A
- Annihilator ANH-SG (Schwerer Gustav)
- Black Knight BL-S7 Gladiator (RT)
- Cataphract CTF-5L
- Jagermech JM6-JO (RT)
- Jagermech JM7-C3BS
- Jagermech JM7-D
- Jagermech JM7-F
- Jagermech JM7-G
- Marauder MAD-S7 (RT)
- Marauder MAD-LT (RT)
- Marauder II MAD-8K
- Marauder II MAD-RX (RT's RISC version sporting a big RAC/20)
- Marauder II MAD-RSC (supposed to be RT's Matar but I do not have a Stone Rhino model)
- Panther PNT-14R
- Rifleman RFL-3CR
- Thunderbolt TDR-12R
- Thunderbolt TDR-E5 ERIS (RT)
- Warhammer WHM-10K
- Warhammer WHM-66 (RT)
- Warhammer WHM-X (RT)
- Wolverine WVR-X (RT)
- Zeus ZEU-X
- The april fool's joke that has gone too far: the Urbanlord UBL-RX (RT) in all its pink glory

Real Special Variants

CAUTION: The IIC variants will only spawn for the Clan faction which requires the YetAnotherClanMech mod!

- Conquistador BLK-O (a Roguetech omni variant of the Black Knight with fixed harjel structure and engine.)
- Conquistador BLK-OA
- Conquistador BLK-OB
- Conquistador BLK-OC
- Conquistador BLK-OD
- Conquistador BLK-MHL Macuahuitl Hero
- Warhammer IIC (just a rescale of the normal Warhammer but I just love the Warhammer so I had to add this.)
- Warhammer IIC 2
- Warhammer IIC 3
- Warhammer IIC 4
- Warhammer IIC 5
- Warhammer IIC 6
- Warhammer IIC 8
- Warhammer IIC 9
- Warhammer IIC 10
- Warhammer IIC 11
- Warhammer IIC 12
- Warhammer IIC 13
- Warhammer IIC Maul Hero Mech
- Warhammer IIC Bludgeon Hero Mech
- Warhammer IIC RAC Hero Mech (my own creation sporting 4 RAC/2s to shred everything)
- Hunchback IIC, IIC-2, IIC-3, IIC-4, IIC-5 (thanks to Mace24 for the weapon models. Also Check his lore-accurate variants mod!)
- Hunchback IIC Deathwish Hero Mech

Additional Stuff

- Advanced AMS and AMS Mk2
- Clan Plasma Canons which reduce the cooling capabilities of the target mech for a while
- Small, Medium and Large Re-Engineered lasers (cannot be in YAW since they require YAML)
- Heavy MRMs (more damage, more heat, can jam)
- RISC MMLs (smaller, lighter, can jam)
author: trueg
